org.gatein.api

Class PortalRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gatein.api.PortalRequest

  • public abstract class PortalRequest
extends Object
    The PortalRequest object represents the current request of the portal. This object is available in the portal simply by invoking the static getInstance() method.
    Author:
    Nick Scavelli, Stian Thorgersen

    • Method Detail

      • getUser

        public abstract User getUser()
        The user of the request. If this request is for an unauthenticated user then User.anonymous() is returned.
        Returns:
        the user of the current portal request. This should never be null.

      • getSiteId

        public abstract SiteId getSiteId()
        The SiteId of the request.
        Returns:
        the site id of the current portal request. This should never be null.

      • getNodePath

        public abstract NodePath getNodePath()
        The NodePath of the request.
        Returns:
        the node path of the current portal request. This should never be null.

      • getLocale

        public abstract Locale getLocale()
        The Locale of the request.
        Returns:
        the locale of the current portal request.

      • getSite

        public Site getSite()
        The site represented by the SiteId of the request.
        Returns:
        the site of the current portal request

      • getPage

        public Page getPage()
        The page currently being accessed by the current portal request.
        Returns:
        the page of the current portal request.

      • getNavigation

        public Navigation getNavigation()
        The navigation of the current portal request.
        Returns:
        the navigation represented by the current portal request.

      • getPortal

        public abstract Portal getPortal()
        Access to the portal interface
        Returns:
        the portal interface

      • getURIResolver

        public abstract URIResolver getURIResolver()
        The resolver used to resolve the URI for Nodes. This is used by Node.getURI() which is the recommended way to obtain the URI for a Node.
        Returns:
        the URI resolver

      • getInstance

        public static PortalRequest getInstance()
        Obtain the current instance of a PortalRequest
        Returns:
        the portal request
